code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import Users from'./Users';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Search=()=>{const[text,setText]=useState('');const[users,setUsers]=useState([]);const searchUsers=async text=>{try{const response=await axios.get("https://api.github.com/search/users?q=".concat(text));setUsers(response.data.items);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching data:',error);}};const clearUsers=()=>{setUsers([]);};const onSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(text===''){alert('Please enter something');}else{searchUsers(text);setText('');}};const onChange=e=>setText(e.target.value);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:onSubmit,className:"form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"text",placeholder:"Search User",value:text,onChange:onChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"submit",value:"Search",className:"btn btn-success btn-block"})]}),users.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-danger btn-block",onClick:clearUsers,children:"Clear"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Users,{users:users})]});};export default Search;
